title: 39th Chelsea International Fine Art Competition Exhibition
description: Agora Gallery’s annual juried exhibition featuring paintings, sculptures, and mixed media pieces. Opening reception on 8/21 from 6-8pm.

title: Eighth Annual Rockaway Film Festival
description: The Rockaway Film Festival returns to Averne Cinema for five days of indoor and outdoor screenings and live music.

description: Downton Abbey: A New Era at Pier A Park (Hoboken).

description: Indiana Jones and the Last Crusade at Prospect Park.

title: Summerstage: Free Concert with Joey Valence + Brae
description: Summerstage presents a free concert with hip-hop duo Joey Valence + Brae at Central Park's Rumsey Playfield.

title: Adam Wade: Live in New York
description: 20-time Moth Story Slam winner Adam Wade returns to Under St. Marks Theater with a storytelling show.
address: Under St. Marks Theater, East Village

title: Will You Accept This Rose? Live with Arden Myrin
description: Podcast host Arden Myrin discusses the latest The Bachelor episode at Union Hall (Park Slope).

title: We Have Fun: A Stand-Up Show
description: Hosts Zach Sims and Dan Wilbur bring the fun-ny to Young Ethel’s (South Slope) with stand-up performances.

title: Ambush Comedy Show
description: The Ambush Comedy Show at Hellrazor Barber Shop in Williamsburg features a lineup of comedians. BYOB.

title: Night Market Comedy
description: A mostly Asian comedy show at Emmy Squared (East Village) featuring standup performances.

title: Rooftop Films Presents: Lurker
description: The popular rooftop films series returns for its 29th season at The Old American Can Factory (Gowanus).
address: The Old American Can Factory, Gowanus

description: Forrest Gump on the rooftop at Pier 17 (Lower Manhattan).

description: The Goonies at Bella Abzug Park (Hell’s Kitchen).

title: 2-for-1 Broadway Week Tickets
description: 2-for-1 Broadway week tickets go on sale today for performances running 9/8 thru 9/21.

title: Brooklyn Books + Booze
description: Hear established and up-and-coming authors read from their current works at Barrow's Intense Tasting Room (Industry City).
address: Barrow's Intense Tasting Room, Industry City

title: Astronomy on Tap: 100th Birthday of Cecilia Payne-Gaposchkin’s Thesis
description: A night where astronomy enthusiasts gather for talks by professional scientists and educators at Pete’s Candy Store (Williamsburg).

title: The Broad Squad
description: Monthly comedy variety show featuring a female-fronted lineup and tarot readings at Young Ethel’s (South Slope).

title: Animation Nights New York
description: Watch a curated program of animated short films from around the world at The Gutter Spare Room (Williamsburg).

title: Cinema Smootaphilia: In the Realm of the Senses
description: Ensemble Erotic performs a live, original soundtrack to Nagisa Ōshima’s 1976 erotic classic at TV Eye (Ridgewood).
